title: Dreams That Can Save Your Life - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 4/17/18
itunes:title: Dreams That Can Save Your Life - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 4/17/18
description:
George Noory and author Kathleen O'Keefe-Kanavos discuss her experience of dreaming that she had breast cancer, and being able to tell doctors exactly where to find the tumor they had not previously detected.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
